title: Name of these nike fonts ? ?
content:
The first one:  
 [http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/3173/airmaxqf8.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/img403.imageshack.us/img403/3173/airmaxqf8.jpg "http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/3173/airmaxqf8.jpg")

The Second one:  
 [http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/1829/nike2zl7.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/img132.imageshack.us/img132/1829/nike2zl7.jpg "http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/1829/nike2zl7.jpg")  
 [http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/2519/nike1tw7.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/img84.imageshack.us/img84/2519/nike1tw7.jpg "http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/2519/nike1tw7.jpg")

I think the 2nd one might be a custom one, but if you could help me find something similar then it would be a big help thanks.

 [‹ Is it Rotis Sans?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41171 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hustomtar - what font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41174 "Go to next forum topic")
author: airmax90

comments.content: Both are likely custom. You might like [ARS Tegel](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/arstype/tegel/).

AIRMAX is quite similar to [Tsoonami](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/www.dafont.com/subatomic-tsoonami.font?nb_ppp=50&text=AIRMAX+airmax), based on a Cartoon Network font from2004. Ray Larabie’s [Zorque](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034409/http:/www.dafont.com/zorque.font?nb_ppp=50&text=AIRMAX+airmax) also resembles it somewhat.

- Mike Yanega
Thanks for your replies. Im going to use the tsoonami one.
